title: Edge Magazine UK - Please help identify
content:
Hi there, does anyone know what this font is? Many thanks in advance.

comments.content:
Simian by House. I think it’s the Gorilla weight.

- Lex

Wow - that was quick Lex!! Thanks very much

George
